en: There will be sent upon you a flame of fire
and smoke, and you will not defend yourselves.
So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
And when the heaven is split open
So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -

ar: فَيَوْمَئِذٍ لَّا يُسَْٔلُ عَن ذَنبِهِ إِنسٌ وَلَا جَانٌّ
en: Then on that Day none will be asked about his sin among men or jinn.
